name: Sunbeams
description:
This is a slow little game about taking care of your cute house plants! You have to water them appropriately and make sure they're in a good mood. When you plants becomes happy, you gain hearts! Different plants require different amounts of hearts to unlock. There's also little bit of information about all the plants in the game for the people who are interested in that!

Thanks to
  • Waffleflower and Isla Pleasure Partridge for testing the game!
  • My lovely girlfriend for helping me when I forgot how to code!
  • Freesound.org for proving ambience and watering sounds!
  • YOU, for just reading this far down the page!

I hope you enjoy this cute little plant game <3
